actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to restore a capital gains tax differential for individual and corporate taxpayers for high-risk, long-term, growth-oriented small business stock held more than 5 years.

summary.text: Venture Capital Gains Act of 1990 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to restore a tax deduction for capital gains on small business stock held for more than five years.

titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to restore a capital gains tax differential for individual and corporate taxpayers for high-risk, long-term, growth-oriented small business stock held more than 5 years.
